method.name: Mount
method.tp:docstring: 'Mounts' a given share by attempting to call smbc_opendir on given share path. 'Mounts' is in quotes because this does not actually do an actual mount since it is not needed on an SMB share. On success, this returns the corresponding mount id.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: mount_id
arg.tp:docstring: Unique identifier of the mounted share.

method.name: Unmount
method.tp:docstring: Unmounts' the mount corresponding to the mount id. 'Unmounts' is in quotes because this does not do an actual unmount since SMB does not need to actually mount a share.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: ReadDirectory
method.tp:docstring: Reads the directory on a given path. This outputs a serialized DirectoryEntryList protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: GetMetadataEntry
method.tp:docstring: Gets the metadata of a given entry. This outputs an serialized DirectoryEntry protobuf.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

method.name: OpenFile
method.tp:docstring: Opens a file with a specified path.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.

arg.name: file_id
arg.tp:docstring: Unique identifier of the open file.

method.name: CloseFile
method.tp:docstring: Closes the file with the specified file handler.

arg.name: error_code
arg.tp:docstring: Returned error code. See ErrorType enum.
